title: Nonlinear optical and spectroscopic properties, thermal analysis, and hemolytic capacity evaluation of quinoline-1,3-benzodioxole chalcone
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10199-10208
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00820K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Efraín Polo-Cuadrado, Edison Osorio, Karen Acosta-Quiroga, Paola Andrea Camargo-Ayala, Iván Brito, Jany Rodriguez, Joel B. Alderete, Oscar Forero-Doria, Edgard Fabián Blanco-Acuña, Margarita Gutiérrez
This article details the synthesis, full characterization, optical properties, theoretical analysis, evaluation of nonlinear optical properties (NLO), and determination of the hemolytic capacity of quinoline-1,3-benzodioxole chalcone(5).
